subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Kyle Orton threw for 299 yards, outdueling Aaron Rodgers, and Kansas City rallied behind the interim coach Romeo Crennel to hand Green Bay its first loss in nearly a calendar year.
snippet: Kyle Orton threw for 299 yards, outdueling Aaron Rodgers, and Kansas City rallied behind the interim coach Romeo Crennel to hand Green Bay its first loss in nearly a calendar year.
